channel.description: Recent content in them. on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-24
item.description: A Meta prototype lets you build virtual worlds by describing them (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg recently showed off a prototype of an artificial intelligence system that lets people build parts of virtual worlds by verbally describing them.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.
